>> n=[1:20];
>> e=(6.^(n+1)./(n.^(n+1).*(n+1)));
>> [n',e']
ans =

   1.0000e+00   1.8000e+01
   2.0000e+00   9.0000e+00
   3.0000e+00   4.0000e+00
   4.0000e+00   1.5188e+00
   5.0000e+00   4.9766e-01
   6.0000e+00   1.4286e-01
   7.0000e+00   3.6420e-02
   8.0000e+00   8.3427e-03
   9.0000e+00   1.7342e-03
   1.0000e+01   3.2982e-04
   1.1000e+01   5.7799e-05
   1.2000e+01   9.3900e-06
   1.3000e+01   1.4216e-06
   1.4000e+01   2.0149e-07

>> diary off
